content: That's amazing! I love the idea of the Bruschetta and Tomato and Basil Skewers for appetizers. I think I'll also make the Caprese Salad for the main course. By the way, I've been harvesting my tomatoes almost daily, and I've noticed that the ones that get more sunlight are sweeter and have fewer blemishes. Do you have any tips on how to ensure my tomato plants get enough sunlight, especially since some of them are starting to grow quite tall?
